Hi mattshma. There's apparently a bug in the init step, where if you use on-disk files for repos in your init-config, the generated app.yaml has incorrect paths in the status> reposCache. As a result, your generate command doesn't fetch packages from your .cache properly. I could solve it by manually fixing localPath "kf/ugc-kf/.cache/manifests" -> "kf/ugc-kf/.cache/manifests/manifests-master" and hence closed the issue. Hope it helps you.
You're right, after modify app.yaml these fields: manifestsRepo, status.reposCache.kubeflow.localPath and status.reposCache.manifests.localPath, I run kfctl generate all -V successful. Thanks!
